title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8199 - Procedures For The Assessment Of Taxable State Lands
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8199 - Procedures For The Assessment Of Taxable State Lands

State Regulations

Subpart 8199-2 - Acquisition And Disposition Of State Lands (§ 8199-2.1)

Subpart 8199-4 - Assessment Of Parcels Of Taxable State Lands (§ 8199-4.1 to 8199-4.3)

Subpart 8199-5 - Aggregate Additional Assessments (§ 8199-5.1)

Subpart 8199-6 - Supplemental And Transition Assessments (§ 8199-6.1 to 8199-6.2)

Subpart 8199-7 - Approval And Certification Of State Land Assessments (§ 8199-7.1)

Subpart 8199-8 - Conservation Easements (§ 8199-8.1 to 8199-8.2)

Subpart 8199-9 - Assessment Of Certain Parcels Of State Land (§ 8199-9.1)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8199

Statutory authority: Real Property Tax Law, §§ 202[1][k], [l], 504, 534, 543, 1570, art. 5, title 2; Environmental Conservation Law, §15-2115

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
